statements: DELETE FROM investments WHERE investment_id = 1001 AND investment_type = 'Stocks';
DELETE FROM portfolio_investments WHERE investment_name = 'Stock A';
DELETE pi FROM portfolio_investments pi JOIN investment_performance ip ON pi.id = ip.investment_id WHERE ip.performance < 0;
DELETE FROM Investors WHERE email LIKE '%example.com'
DELETE FROM investors WHERE investor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND investment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND investment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND investor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
DELETE FROM investment_sector WHERE investment_id = 3 AND sector_id = 4;
DELETE FROM investment WHERE portfolio_id = 1 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM performance WHERE start_value < 1000 AND return > 5.0;
